title: Contrary To

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Reverse a target. They cannot be visited tonight, and will instead perform all actions that would have happened to them on the would-be visitor.
- Inverse a target. All external protection on them turns into the equivalent level of attack, and all attacks become the equivalent level of protection. You will learn what attacks/defence occurred, if any.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You cannot reverse the same target twice in a row.
- You may only use one ability per night.

*I let go, and walk alone within this man-made galaxy.*
